definitions.text: the products of human creativity; works of art collectively
the creation of beautiful or significant things
examples: art does not need to be innovative to be good
I was never any good at art
he said that architecture is the art of wasting space beautifully

definitions.text: a superior skill that you can learn by study and practice and observation
photographs or other visual representations in a printed publication
examples: the publisher was responsible for all the artwork in the book
